text: The Valisar Trilogy is a series of epic fantasybooks written by Australian author Fiona McIntosh. The trilogy started with Royal Exile in 2008 and continued with A Tyrant's Blood in 2008 and King's Wrath in 2010. The series was published by HarperVoyager. == Books == * 2008 - Royal Exile * 2009 - A Tyrant's Blood * 2010 - King's Wrath == External links == * Official website of Fiona McIntosh Category:Australian fantasy novels Category:Australian fantasy novel series Category:Fantasy novel trilogies Category:HarperCollins books
title: Valisar Trilogy
